title: Terence Tao
summary: Terence Chi-Shen "Terry" Tao FAA FRS (Chinese: 陶哲軒; born 17 July 1975) is an Australian-born mathematician. He is a professor of mathematics at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA), where he holds the James and Carol Collins chair. His research includes topics in harmonic analysis, partial differential equations, algebraic combinatorics, arithmetic combinatorics, geometric combinatorics, probability theory, compressed sensing and analytic number theory.[4]
